articles.description: The modern world can feel curiously unreal. We wake, work, and sleep in climate-controlled boxes. We can talk to a dozen people, survey a distant location, and restock our homes by making micro movements with a finger.  We can ask robots to clone voices, crea…
articles.content:
The modern world can feel curiously unreal.
We wake, work, and sleep in climate-controlled boxes.
We can talk to a dozen people, survey a distant location, and restock our homes by making micro mov… [+1781 chars]
